messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Democratic National Committee view on homeschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/18/2000 1:38:30 PM !!!First Boot!!!, FUNLists@IQCweb.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/18/2000 1:38:30 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
FUNLists@... writes:

<< http://www.democrats.org/gopwatch/bushwatch/accountability/home.html
(from another list)

Since this is on the DNC site, it is obviously meant to be a negative
attack on Bush, but it has the opposite effect on me. It makes it
clear that the DNC must be in favor of more regulation and supportive
of the NEA stance.

Billy >>


Well, that's what I got from it to but . . .

Has anyone seen an actual platform plank from the Dems spelling out their
position on hsing? I have looked in several places but have not seen
anything that addresses hsing specifically.

Thanks.

Nance
